title: Statement of Assignments
content:
Introduction of the course materials

The assignments were created by me during my study in the University of Rochester and they were uploaded to the Course List -> Master. No course-related materials of any professor were uploaded. And the Only use of the related materials is for my individual recording. These materials are not permitted be be used for any other purpose.

About Academic Integrity

If there are similar assignments or labs or projects in the future, it is the responsibility of UR students not to copy or modify these codes, or other files because it is against the Simon’s Code of Academic Integrity. The owner of this repository doesn’t take any commitment for other’s faults.
